I have been redirected here from the Discord #rust-usage channel

Hi. I have a question regarding an error message from the compiler. I made a mistake an added a semicolon after a function call inside an unsafe block (as in https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=c77daa3cc023d02f8b7353a581ffe527). Do you think that there is a way to modify rustc to return a more meaningful message? I am willing to work on the fix, if this could be relevant.
We have a "Consider removing this semicolon" suggestion when this happens with the last expression in a function, perhaps that could be extended to cover more cases?
